data.text: @CBCNS There are plenty of restrictions that one may continue to practice without the government holding your hand. So if that’s what floats your boat, enjoy!
@CBCNS Tories are telling our doctors what to do thanks to the Karen crazy convoy in Ottawa
@CBCNS Very one sided, kind of controlling the media for @nsgov @TimHoustonNS  and @StrangRobert . There must of level headed doctors out there?
@CBCNS I’m all for moving past this whole Covid mess but something fishy goin on with all Maritime provinces appearing to be getting outta Covid dodge !! Hmmmm 🤔
@CBCNS You accidentally posted a picture of a foot though
@CBCNS No one cares what these people think
